reviewText:
Our 3 year old grandson loves Thomas and we enjoy getting DVD's for him because he watches them over and over again.  Now his little brother is enjoying them too.  It's a great investment for us.

The DVD's came quickly and in perfect shape.  The only downside is they are not the most up to date, but they still enjoy them.

Great Value - makes Mom's & Dad's happy & Any Thomas fan will love these DVD's.

Shipped quickly - arrived as scheduled.

Thanks for the DVDs. Shipping was fast and the discs were exactly as advertised.  Thinking about planning a trip with the wife to the island of Sodor now. Seems pleasant, even with all  the coal burning.

Movies were short and lack a proper Thomas plot...would not recommend.
We were very disappointed in the quality of the movies.

The 3 movies in this pack is a great deal.  The only thing that I didn't like about it was that the movies are all in one, which would be fine if they all had their own seperate spaces.  All of the DVD's go on one ring, so they are all sitting on top of eachother spinning around.

These are the same full length (60 minute or so) movies that you would buy seperately. All are appropriate for a 3.5 year old.  The only wish I had (and the reason it only got 4 stars) is that there is a full introduction to each episode. It would be better if they did like the Bob the builder DVDs and did a full intro at the start, and then a scaled down one between episodes.

I didn't know where to start our Thomas collection so chose this.  In retrospect, the movie titles are not the perfect choice for our 17mo (too long) but we do enjoy putting them in for long trips. The movies themselves have good values, Great place to start our Thomas collection!

This is a great set of Thomas DVDs perfect for any Thomas & Friends fan. With three full DVDs for less than $20 you really can't go wrong! The DVDs features Thomas & Friends chugging along in fun adventures that mesmerized my boys. They are all wholesome and full of great lessons for kids.  I should add too that since these DVDs have already been released years ago, you should make sure you don't have them already if you are buying this set.
love it
My daughter loves it!
Good movie for young kids
This was shipped very fast and was exactly what I expected.

Disappointed. Only one of three video's my son will watch. Hero of railway. The only 2 are old Thomas which I hate.  His mouth doesn't move. All people are plastic. If they are going to sell these old miviez. At least let parents have chouce. Very fustraiting...
Was great, my lil girl loved it... She watches it everyday!!! Thank you

Purchased this for my little grandson as he is a big train fan. He loves the videos. They really entertain him. One thing, there are several movies and in the 1st one, mabybe the 2nd one also, the trains do not talk, the book is read.
everything great

Not quite what I expected. I was expecting it to be the same as the Thinas and Friends show on PBS but was not as cartoonish. Only watched part of one video so far. My son wasn't as interested in watching this video as show in PBS
great
If you love thomas, its great
Another Great DVD for Kids my Little  Buddy Loves It!
Good quality DVD.
Not a fan of this set.  My grandson loves Thomas, but got bored quick.
2 out of the 3 videos were of the old Thomas when the characters were more like clay, unfortunately my guy hates those ones.
This was such a great price for 3 Thomas Movies. My first Hero of the Rails was so scratched we had to dump it. I bought this to replace "Hero", but got 2 extra movies on top. We Love Thomas!
It's a bunch of Thomas movies. If you don't like Thomas don't get it and if you do it's perfect.

I bought this for my 2 year old son who loves Thomas. Two out of the three movies are horrible! Soooooo old school they look like they were filmed in the 1970's or something. They are literally just plastic toy trains being pushed around the scenes, the characters faces don't move other than their eyes going side to side, their mouths don't move when they talk. The only modern movie in the pack is Hero of the Rails, I wish I would have known so I would have just bought the one movie by itself because we aren't going to watch the other two in the pack.  Also, as another review mentioned the three discs are just stacked on top of each other in the case with no dividers between them.
A wholesome show that I will let my child watch.  She loves the music.  Good value to get 3 movies for the price.

My son loves this movie pack! He has always liked Thomas the train, so purchasing this pack was a great idea. The songs are all great and my son is 20 months old: he dances to the songs! This was a great choice indeed.
Purchased for my 4 year old son's birthday. He loves Thomas, so I couldn't go wrong with this.
Grandkids loved it,
This pack is great, keeps my nephew intertained during car rides and at home as well.
My son wanted the Thomas & Friends DVDs for his children when they are old enough ..
Somehow, I received the wrong movie. Instead of receiving Calling all Engines (like I ordered), I received a different movie. Disappointed but kept it anyway. The other 2 were great.
My son learn Spanish with this movie.
My son enjoyed it all a lot .
Great product!
This has 3 movies lots of Thomas for 2 year old to enjoy. He sit and watches them over and over.
My son is entertained for hours with this dvd set. Thomas is great for boys teaching usefulness and how to help one another.
Great price for 3 movies. My son loves thomas and watched these movies over and over again. This was a life saver.
My granddaughter loves Thomas the train so this video was perfect for her. As with all her Thomas things it quickly became her favorite.
This was bought for our grandson's Christmas present.  Arrived on time and was what we ordered.  It was a huge hit with him.  It made our Christmas special. Would recommend it.

WE have a three year old that is obsessed with Thomas.  Every waking hour, he is playing with his set.  When we went to potty train him, of course he had to have the panties too :)

These videos are very good quality, and keep in line with the Thomas & Friends branding.  Nice set!
great dvd for the price.  kept my son entertained for a lonnnnnnnnnnnnngggggggggggggg time....  I would suggest to anyone looking to keep someone busy.

it was a xmas present for them and it arrived in plenty of time to be wrapped
my nephew just loved the moved and watch it over and over again
Perfect for my grandson and oh so very cute...thank you so much! So very cute!!! Grandma rocks! At least in my grandson's eyes!!
My grandson is into Thomas the train and all of his friends..  I found the hero's for almost the same price as the 3 pack.. I can't wait to give it to him..
one of three English-language films arrived and Amazon as indicated on their website and the cover art of the film dubbed in Spanish
We got these movies for our son and he absolutely loves all of them. It was definitely a smart choice!
It's Thomas the Train!
Just what I wanted.
These are good ones. My son enjoys them often.
Surprised that it was brand new unopened!
Never watches, all the old versions
Just what I was looking for!

Disappointed when we received the set and realized only one of the movies was the newer version of Thomas, the other two are the old stop-motion type. The description of the DVD set needs to be changed to reflect that.
Good for the kids
My son loved it! Thanks again
Kids love it
